DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , one-sequence , 2-period , within-subject study 2 cohort evaluate effect multiple dos itraconazole fluoxetine pharmacokinetics single dose RO5285119 healthy volunteer . In Cohort 1 , subject receive single dose RO5285119 Day 1 ( Period 1 ) , wash-out period 14 day , itraconazole Days 1-8 Period 2 coadministration RO5285119 Day 4 . In Cohort 2 , subject receive single dose RO5285119 Day 1 ( Period 1 ) , wash-out period 14 day , fluoxetine Days 1-12 Period 2 coadministration RO5285119 Day 6 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Effect Multiple Doses Itraconazole Fluoxetine Pharmacokinetics Single Dose RO5285119 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject , 18 55 year age , inclusive . Healthy status define absence evidence active chronic disease follow detailed medical surgical history , complete physical examination Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 inclusive Women must postmenopausal ( least 12 month amenorrhea confirm FSH , least 24 month hormone replacement therapy ) surgically sterile ( absence ovary and/or uterus ) For men female partner childbearing potential : agreement use barrier method contraception treatment period least 3 month last dose study drug Suspicion regular consumption drug abuse , history drug alcohol abuse Positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C , HIV infection Participation investigational drug device study within 90 day prior first dose Concomitant disease condition could interfere , treatment might interfere , conduct study , would , opinion investigator , pose unacceptable risk subject study Hypersensitivity itraconazole , ingredient , triazole antifungal , know contraindication itraconazole state SmPC Hypersensitivity fluoxetine ingredient , know contraindication fluoxetine state SmPC
